De Duck Synth control 1.0
 
 Created by Iftach Yakar 2015
 
 How to use:
 1) Turn on your synth and switch it to "Bluetooth mode".
 2) Turn on your Android bluetooth and connect the device labeled "HC-05" (default password is probably 1234).
 3) Run this app (if already running, use the "connect to bluetooth" option from the menu.
 4) Turn the knobs to affect the synth.
 5) drag one of the sensor X,Y,Z axis to a knob to assign that axis to that knob.
 
 You can only save and load presets using the save/load buttons. Note that presets are saved in 3 types:
 *Values and Sensors: The preset will be saved as is: all the current values recorded, and all the sensor assignments as well
 *Values only: Sensor assignments will be ignored
 *Sensors only: Knob values will be ignored.
 When loading a preset, the current state will be changed according to the preset type.
 
 Have fun!
